alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Franklin, eastern Phelps, west central Adams, Kearney and southeastern Buffalo Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 812 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gibbon to near Kearney to near Funk. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kearney, Minden, Gibbon, Kenesaw, Axtell, Hildreth, Wilcox, Funk, Upland, Heartwell and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 264 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps
